value.0:
Book of Enchanting

The Rules on this Server for Enchanting are as follows.

NOTE: Enchanting is a Lore and Spellcraft Skill Set (whichever is higher).

1) MUST have an Intelligence OR Wisdom of 14 (+2) or more. You CAN add rings and such to make this happen. Total Score is what counts.

2) +4 is Max for AC and any Enhancements

2a) +5 for Two-Handed Weapons (Medium Creatures)

3) 1d10 is the Max for Elemental Damage Bonuses (5 Items)....This applies to things that can damage like weapons or arrows.

4) 5/- DR is Max for any Elemental Resistances (1 Item)....This applies to anything that protects the character.

5) You may ONLY have 1 Type of Elemental Bonus Enchanted to your Item....This means you can only add Fire or Acid or something but not more than 1 type.

6) The Enchanting Table has a DC of 30 to craft successfully. When you close the Table you roll a d20 plus your Lore or Spellcraft Skill Points. You must have 31 or better!

7) Personal Bonuses....You are allowed to have a maximum of +4 on any item in regards to Enchanting. You CAN have more than 1 type...say +2 CON and +2 STR. You MAY NOT go above or add another Personal Bonus when the total there is already +4 or more of ANY type. That item is Locked out and not able to enhance further.

8) Mass Criticals on Weapons may be added at the Crafting Anvil via your Crafting Menu. For every 10 Diamonds you can add one Dice Roll of Mass Critical Damage (Even after an item can no longer be enchanted!). You can Add Up to 3 Stacks (30 Diamonds) => 1d4, 1d6, 1d8

Please Ask Questions if you don't understand something.



What is Enchanting? This is the process of the natural properties of one item and transferring that specific energy to another item. The quantity of energy transferred is directly proportional to the quantity of natural items. The High Elves have designed a magical forge the we call the Enchanting Table that those of skill could make weapons of lore and legend. The High Elves were solely responsible for the creation of such items. However, they knew that such power could be easily misused by a few Elves that have converted to non-elven beliefs so the power of the Enchanting Table was limited in its capability somewhat. Still quite powerful...the High Elves have simply ascertained the power level to maintain nature's balances.

How to Enchant Items:

Place an Item on the Enchanting Table.

Then add gems to enhance the item. The type of gem and quantity is dependent upon what you intend to enchant. The following is all the acceptable additions by item type that can be added on the Enchanting Table. There is a maximum enhancement on every item that can possibly be absorbed.

Also note....if you try to transfer energies to an item that can not absorb that energy the gem is lost and of course the energy can not be absorbed. This could be very costly for you.
Make sure you check the list below for which item types can absorb which energy types for complete compatibility.

NOTE: The Enchanting Table will stay locked for 5 rounds.

Nature's Gems:
Guldur Gems  ( Ioun Stones ):
These are magical creations by the High Elves. These gems are made by casting the appropriate spell on an Earth gem. The type of spell matched with the correct Earth gem will create these magical stones. The spells have been kept secret by the High Elves but rumors are known that a very few select wizard's have some knowledge of the spells required for this. Some Ioun Stones are also found naturally in nature.
 
The Ioun Stones are (as Enchanted by the Enchanting Table) -
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
Pale Blue Ioun Stone (STR +1 Each)
Deep Red Ioun Stone (DEX +1 Each)
Pink Ioun Stone (CON +1 Each)
Scarlet and Blue Ioun Stone (INT +1 Each)
Blue Ioun Stone (WIS +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)

Diamonds - Precious and the hardest substance known. The natural essences can be transferred to many weapons to increase their potency. They enhance the Attack Bonus, Damage Bonus, and Enhancement Bonus to all weapons.

Mithril - Not really a gem but the small amounts of energies in a bar of this can alloy a metal to help make it extra sharp during honing (Keen).

Nature's Elementals:
Acid used in the Acidflask
Cold from Coldstones
Divine from Holy Water
Electrical from Quartz
Fire used in Alchemist's Fire
Negative from the Skeleton's Knuckle
Sonic from the Thunderstone

All elementals provide the properties of random dice rolls to damage bonus from 1d4 to 2d12 depending upon the number of gems on the table.
1=1d4, 2=1d6, 3=1d8, 4=2d4, 5=1d10 (Not Used on this Server 6=1d12, 7=2d6, 8=2d8, 9=2d10, 10=2d12)
The elementals also give 5/- Damage Resistance to that elemental damage.

Equipment can only absorb the energy that they are capable of absorbing. Below you will see what items can absorb which gem or elemental.

Armor:
Armor has the properties of protecting the wearer from getting damaged.

Armor can absorb:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)
All Elementals for DR 5/- each

Helmets:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
Scarlet and Blue Ioun Stone (INT +1 Each)
Blue Ioun Stone (WIS +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)
All Elementals for DR 5/- each

Bracers:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
Pale Blue Ioun Stone (STR +1 Each)
All Elementals for DR 5/- each

Gloves:
Pale Blue Ioun Stone (STR +1 Each)
Deep Red Ioun Stone (DEX +1 Each)
All Elementals for 1=1d4, 2=1d6, 3=1d8, 4=2d4, 5=1d10

Cloaks:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)
All Elementals for DR 5/- each

Shields:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (AC +1 Each)
All Elementals for DR 5/- each

Weapons:
Diamond -
Martial (AB +1 of the Enhancement Bonus Type each)
Ranged (AB +1 of the Attack Bonus Type each)
Projectiles (Damage Bonus +1 each)
Mithril -
Martial (Keen Property)
Ranged Weapons (To make them Mighty) -
Pale Blue Ioun Stone (STR +1 Enhancement (Mighty) Each)

Amulets:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (Natural AC +1 Each)
Pink Ioun Stone (CON +1 Each)
Scarlet and Blue Ioun Stone (INT +1 Each)
Blue Ioun Stone (WIS +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)
Divine for DR 5/- each
Negative for DR 5/- each

Rings:
Deep Red Ioun Stone (DEX +1 Each)
Scarlet and Blue Ioun Stone (INT +1 Each)
Blue Ioun Stone (WIS +1 Each)
Pink and Green Ioun Stone (CHA +1 Each)

Belts:
Pale Blue Ioun Stone (STR +1 Each)
Pink Ioun Stone (CON +1 Each)
Divine for DR 5/- each
Negative for DR 5/- each

Boots:
Dusty Rose Ioun Stone (Dodge AC +1 Each)
Pink Ioun Stone (CON +1 Each)
Deep Red Ioun Stone (DEX +1 Each)
Cold for DR 5/- each
